task.title: Connect Your PBX
task.shortdesc: Connect your PBX to the local network, and connect telephony lines to the PBX.

step.cmd: Connect your PBX to the network.

info.p: Connect one end of an Ethernet cable to the LAN port of your PBX, and the other end to any port of your company’s LAN switch/router.
Plug the provided power cord or power adapter into the power inlet of the PBX, and the other end to a standard electrical wall socket.
Wait for the system to boot up till the SYSTEM LED starts to blink.

step.cmd: Connect your PBX to the telephony lines.

info.note: Connect BRI/PSTN/analog phone/fax machine to the corresponding port based on the color of port indicator.

stentry.p: Connect one end of a RJ11 phone cable to the port. Connect the other end to the analog phone or fax machine.
Connect an RJ11 cable to the FXO port. Connect the other end to a PSTN line.
Connect one end of the cable provided by the ISDN BRI provider to the BRI port. Connect the other end to the equipment of ISDN provider.

ul.li: Connect one end of the E1 cable to the E1/T1 port. Connect the other end to the E1 Provider’s equipment.
